668410.name: Eternal Empires
668410.description:
At day one of Early Access Eternal Empires will have:
-skirmish mode with random map generation
-high replayability due to procedural map generation
-great UI for micro-management of units
-resource management
-base building



Eternal Empires is a real-time strategy game, similar in gameplay to old-school RTS games from early 2000s. It has all the essential RTS features such as base building, resource gathering, resource spending, building up and commanding military.

Maps are procedurally generated, with random terrain, and procedurally placed resources

As game progresses, players have to research new technologies to stay ahead.

Player loses when all his units and buildings are destroyed.
668410.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
